synopsis.text:
When Kraft Lawrence, a roaming merchant, stumbles upon the quaint village of Pasloe, he encounters the enchanting Holo, a wolf deity with the ability to ensure abundant harvests. As the villagers' self-reliance grows, Holo's significance fades into the realm of folklore. Seizing the opportunity to return to her northern homeland of Yoitsu, Holo forges a deal with Lawrence: in exchange for her wisdom and knack for discerning character, the merchant will escort her on her journey.

As the once solitary Lawrence embarks on this adventure with his newfound companion, he discovers that traversing the countryside with an ancient goddess has its share of challenges and rewards. With Holo by his side, Lawrence's dream of establishing his own shop seems more attainable than ever. However, as they navigate the ever-changing landscape of business and personal growth, the merchant's ambitions evolve in ways he never anticipated. Witness the captivating tale of an unlikely duo, bound by mutual ambition and camaraderie, in this enchanting anime.
